c74object.name: fl.interval~
c74object.digest: Schedules frames at regular intervals set by the interval parameter.
c74object.description: The output is an empty trigger frame. Scheduling is optionally switchable if the switchable parameter is set at instantiation. The on parameter can be used to start and stop scheduling when this is the case.

entry.name: 1. /interval [double]
entry.description: Sets the interval between frames in the units specified by the units parameter.

entry.name: 2. /units [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the time units used for setting the interval.
[0] - samples [1] - ms [2] - seconds [3] - hz

entry.name: 3. /switchable [instantiation bool]
entry.description: Sets whether the object is switchable or not (setting this on can reduce CPU efficiency).

entry.name: 4. /on [bool]
entry.description: Sets the state when in switchable mode in order to start and stop the timing of intervals.

objarg.name: interval
objarg.digest: Sets the interval between frames in the units specified by the units parameter
objarg.description: Sets the interval between frames in the units specified by the units parameter.

objarg.name: units
objarg.digest: Sets the time units used for setting the interval
objarg.description: Sets the time units used for setting the interval.

objarg.name: switchable
objarg.digest: Sets whether the object is switchable or not (setting this on can reduce CPU efficiency)
objarg.description: Sets whether the object is switchable or not (setting this on can reduce CPU efficiency).

objarg.name: on
objarg.digest: Sets the state when in switchable mode in order to start and stop the timing of intervals
objarg.description: Sets the state when in switchable mode in order to start and stop the timing of intervals.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Synchronise with audio or accept signal IO

method.name: frame
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

method.name: sync
method.description: Used internally by FrameLib connection routines. User messages have no effect

attribute.name: buffer
attribute.description: Sets the non-realtime buffer for this object

attribute.name: rt
attribute.description: Sets the realtime state for this object

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Sets the context name for this object
